Chapter 6 Interactive component 6.0.1 interactive map This map shows total crime count for each BORO. .map-layer { fill: #fff; stroke: #aaa; } .effect-layer{ pointer-events:none; } text{ font-family: 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-weight: 300; } text.big-text{ font-size: 30px; font-weight: 400; } .effect-layer text, text.dummy-text{ font-size: 12px; }
